Job Description:
Software development is highly technical work,  and to be successful you should be detail oriented yet able to see the bigger picture while working in the small details. To work in this field you must have strong skills in the basic computer coding languages: HTML,  Javascript,  and C++. Beyond these,  the top software development tools change often and you must be keep up with trends to have your work be cutting edge. 
Job Role Excellent Design and development skills. Ability to create reusable components and frameworks using Object oriented methodology.
Follow coding and development standards.
Designing,  writing,  and executing unit test plans.
Ensuring bug- free applications
Troubleshoot technical issues and identify modifications needed in existing applications
1 year to 3 years.
Technical Skills Strong on .NET Framework 2.0/  3.0/  3.5/  4.0.
Expertise in C#. NET,  OOPS,  MS- SQL Server 2005 /   2008,  JavaScript,  AJAX,  Web Services.
Should have experience in Building solutions on SharePoint 2013 /   SharePoint Foundation /   SharePoint Online /   SharePoint 2010.
Should be experienced in SharePoint Server /   Client Object Model Development
Core SharePoint Development,  OOB Web parts,  Integrating Third Party Web Part components.
Building Custom Web Parts,  Event Handlers,  Features and Sandbox Solutions.
Experience in deploying applications.
Ability to create database objects like tables,  views,  indexes,  triggers,  stored procedures.
